Questions: In your opinion, what worked well?
Responses: Everything! All steps are very well-explained. As an intermediate R user who learned mostly from trial-and-error, this is the guide I was lacking when I introduced myself to R. I especially like the section on what to do if something doesn't work/how not to panic + explanation of why using formalized version control is essential. Language is gentle and doesn't talk down to the inexperienced user.
